full_summary:
===============

### Tender Notice: Bulk Garbage Removal at DND Gander, Newfoundland and Labrador

**Reference Number:** WS3865149345
**Publication Date:** February 16, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** March 23, 2023, 14:00:00 EST

**Tender Description:**

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites bids for Bulk Garbage Removal services at the DND Gander, Newfoundland and Labrador. The scope of work includes the supply of labor, materials, and equipment for garbage removal and service of bulk garbage containers and roll-on garbage containers at 9 Wing Gander in Gander, NL.

**Term of Contract:**

The contract is for a two-year term from the date of award, with an option to extend by one year under the same terms and conditions.

**Bid Requirements:**

Bid security is NOT required for this tender.

**Amendment to Closing Time:**

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All bid submissions must be submitted by 14:00:00 EST on March 23, 2023. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

**Non-Responsive Bids:**

Bids will not be accepted if submitted after the designated closing time. The contracting entity is not liable for late or lost bids.

**Additional Information:**

* Trade Agreements: This tender is open to qualified bidders under various trade agreements, including the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).
* Regions of Delivery: The services will be delivered in Newfoundland and Labrador.
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Alexandria Dwyer (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [alexandria.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alexandria.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL:**

[http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15445373?extsite=MTU0NDUzNzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15445373?extsite=MTU0NDUzNzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Important Dates:

* Tender Closing Date: March 23, 2023, 14
